title: How texor convert Sweave to R Markdown

code: library(texor)     article_dir <- system.file("examples/sweave_article", package = "texor")     dir.create(your_article_folder <- file.path(tempdir(), "tempdir"))     x <- file.copy(from = article_dir, to = your_article_folder,recursive = TRUE)     your_article_path <- paste(your_article_folder, "sweave_article", "example.Rnw",sep="/")     your_article_path <- xfun::normalize_path(your_article_path)     texor::rnw_to_rmd(your_article_path,                        output_format = "bookdown",                        clean_up = TRUE,                        autonumber_eq = FALSE)     unlink(your_article_folder, recursive = TRUE)

what: Converting LaTeX R Journal Articles into RJ-web-articles
title: Converting LaTeX R Journal Articles into RJ-web-articles
text: R package texor ease LaTeX R Journal / Sweave article migration web format providing tools utilities.

title: Converting LaTeX R Journal Articles into RJ-web-articles
text: Install pandoc v3.1 greater, ideally latest version. using Rstudio, pre-installed. included PDF conversions also install poppler-utils (used pdftools package) Ideally install latest version poppler-utils. Install mainline version CRAN : Install development version GitHub :
code: # To check the version of pandoc rmarkdown::pandoc_version() # or to simply check if you are good to go in terms of pandoc texor::pandoc_version_check() # TRUE if pandoc is good to go, else FALSE install.packages('texor') # install.packages("remotes") remotes::install_github("Abhi-1U/texor") # install.packages("pak") pak::pak("Abhi-1U/texor")

title: Converting LaTeX R Journal Articles into RJ-web-articles
text: quick example use texor package sample RJournal article (included package inst/article)
code: # for a single LaTeX article  texor::latex_to_web(article_dir) # A running example article_dir <- system.file("examples/article", package = "texor") dir.create(your_article_folder <- file.path(tempdir(), "tempdir")) x <- file.copy(from = article_dir, to = your_article_folder,recursive = TRUE,) your_article_path <- paste(your_article_folder,"article",sep="/") # view your original article at your_article_path texor::latex_to_web(your_article_path,..) # view  your converted and original article at paste0(your_article_path,"/web")

title: Converting LaTeX R Journal Articles into RJ-web-articles
text: Similar conversion R journal articles, pass file path(instead folder path) function.
code: texor::rnw_to_rmd(file_path,..)  # Additionally you can set the options to modify the end result as per your needs.

title: Converting LaTeX R Journal Articles into RJ-web-articles
code: # for multiple articles in RJ folder structure #base dir  article_dir <- "C:/Users/abhis/path/to/base" # list of journal number directories journal_dirs <- list.dirs(article_dir,recursive = FALSE) # list of individual slug directories slug_dirs <- lapply(journal_dirs,function(journal_dir) {     list.dirs(journal_dir,recursive = FALSE) }) # creating a single list of all slug directories slug_dirs <- unlist(slug_dirs) # Calling  for (dir in slug_dirs) {     #print(dir)     getwd()     # below function will create a log file of success/error in current     # working directory while running the texor::latex_to_web() function     texor:::convert_to_html(dir) }

code: dir.create(your_article_folder <- file.path(tempdir(), "exampledir")) example_files <- system.file("examples/article", package = "texor") x <- file.copy(from = example_files,to=your_article_folder,recursive = TRUE) your_article_path <- paste(your_article_folder,"article",sep="/") texor::log_setup(your_article_path, "log-file.log", "texor" , 2) texor::texor_log("Hello", "INFO", 2) #> INFO [2025-07-20 08:51:16] Hello #> NULL cat(readLines(paste(your_article_path,"/log-file.log",sep="")),sep="\n") #> INFO [2025-07-20 08:51:16] Hello unlink(your_article_folder,recursive = TRUE)

title: Version 1.5.6
text: CRAN release: 2025-04-01

title: Version 1.5.6
text: Table/Figure/Algorithm Numbering Issues broken updates pandoc texor fixed. Fixed table references shown ?? instead number reference name. Added soft fuse fig_code_chunk skip converting images, encountering non standard Image. Updated workflows badges.

title: Version 1.5.3
text: CRAN release: 2024-12-13

title: Version 1.5.3
text: Fixed path search DESCRIPTION file package directory. Moved clean function .exit(), instead sequential execution. Fixed issue #99 Lua filter work newer pandoc version.

title: Version 1.5.0
text: CRAN release: 2024-10-15

title: Version 1.5.0
text: Included CodeCov code coverage workflow closing issue #70. Included custom JavaScript auto-numbering equations independent number_sections: option, fixing issue #83 issue #86. Optional automatic equation numbering custom pandoc Lua filter, fixing issue #68. New option convert figures R markdown code chunks instead regular markdown syntax, somewhat fixing issue #80. New option convert table structures csv data file, included article using kable() code block. New option suppress package start messages generated document, fixing issue #81. New options vignette output styles including bookdown,litedown biocstyle, closing issue #76. Use pseudocodejs rendering Algorithm environment R markdown files, closing issue #69. texor::rnw_to_rmd() now also modifies DESCRIPTION file (available) Dependency Suggests VignetteBuilder missing (#94)

title: Version 1.5.0
text: Fixed Issue #78 references hyperlinked. Fixed Issue #67 unlabeled tables numbered. Updated example Sweave file. Added support jss style LaTeX macros issue #77. Partially fixed Issue #84 renaming bibliography file appropriately. Fixed Issue #79 \vspace*{},\hspace*{} ignored. Removed web_only parameter yaml front matter, adapting changes rjtools package. Using updated table_code_chunk pandoc Lua filter, preserves table data effectively, see supported types information. texor::rnw_to_rmd(): front_matter_type parameter now called output_format defaults (#91). support offline math bookdown format, math_method option now set katex (better accessibility) default, case equation numbering set mathjax (#92,#90). Fixed Relative Paths Issue texor::rnw_to_rmd() (#93). VignetteEngine bookdown format now knitr::rmarkdown (#94). Removed excess print() statements Lua Filters. figure/table referenced sweave code chunk labelled prefix (fig:,tab:,table:) references transformed bookdown style label.

title: Version 1.4.0
text: Initial Support Sweave (.Rnw) article conversion. new Hex-sticker package. Simplification Readme file.

title: Version 1.4.0
text: Fixed Rd files LaTeX like syntax conform recent R changes. Removed redundant comments regarding pandoc version checks examples. Updates warning messages notes Rd section.

title: Version 1.3.0
text: CRAN release: 2023-09-27

title: Version 1.3.0
text: Equations better handled equation references edited match bookdown format. Knitting Rmarkdown now done outside temp folder avoid PDF compilation errors. Added workaround macros \nameref{} \autoref{}. Added workaround macros \scalebox{}, \fbox{}, \adjustbox{}, \framebox{}. Option set DPI invoking convert_to_png function.

title: Version 1.3.0
text: CodeBlocks WideTables now back original form. Algorithm get separate numbering references. Removed unnecessary warnings. Better mechanism remove leftover text processing tikz. Package names using \pkg{} now bold. Reduced DPI raster images reduce file sizes. Algorithmic treated figures. Fixes lua filters equation now adds basic support tabular removes nested inline math. Fixing logic table reference numbering.

title: Version 1.3.0
text: images processed set default alt-text : ‘graphic without alt text’

title: Version 1.2.0
text: CodeBlock WideTable get numbering (share references figures), Enhancement #51. added support \command{..} macro. Included dummy slug citation_url, Issue #50. Included constructor sample article, Enhancement #52. Added support \file{},\var{},\env{},\option{},\dfn{}, \cpkg{} \samp{} macro. Asking user Inputs interactive_mode, Enhancement #53.

title: Version 1.2.0
text: Modified workflow avoid missing Images. Modified Lua filters suppress numbering widetables captions. Fixed Issue #49 text algorithms left behind. Updated pdf conversion functions poppler version check note man pages. Fixed copying markdown files back temp_mode. Set unlink() .exit() function temp_mode Removed table Numbering images gridded table environment within Figure environment.

title: Version 1.1.0
text: New mechanism convert articles without wrapper files. Support non-standard named RJwrapper files. Support files inclusive articles, however articles included main article included. Support smallexample code environment Enhancement #47 : temporary mode conversions keep original LaTeX article untouched. Bumped pandoc version requirement 2.17 3.1 (minimum), latest (recommended)

title: Version 1.1.0
text: Figure Environment wont numbered Image . Now tikz images can hot reloaded, need remove \includegraphics{} line manually. Fixed #46 tikz style blocks persist. Fixed #45 Enhancement #47. Closed #41 momentarily. Default issue year now based current date. Fixed #48 - Lua filter added check DisplayMath equation numbering. Closed #40 issues fixed.

title: Version 1.0.5
text: new Lua Filter check possible issues LaTeX file conversion New function check multiple labels used environment

title: Version 1.0.5
text: Updated Image caption Lua filter broken pandoc v3 (Figure update) Updated pkgdown website theme Fixed Lua Filter add extensions LaTeX Figure elements

title: Version 1.0.3

title: Version 1.0.2

title: Version 1.0.1

title: Version 1.0.1
text: Algorithm figures now numbered. Added boxedverbatim support code environments. Included web_only parameter embedding PDF using Rmarkdown produce HTML. Updated MathJax Version3 added -tex_math_single_backslash extension pandoc better math handling. Support sample articles without directory structure required RJ articles. Updated Instructions examples (hence closing GitHub Issue #23). Updated contributor information. examples test cases. Pandoc Version checker better compatibility experience. Markdown checker better compatibility experience. CRAN release.

title: Version 1.0.1
text: Using xfun::normalize_path() instead normalizePath() relative/absolute path handling Stream editor also works algorithm environments. Fixed image sizing paramaters. New algorithm find, convert copy images appropriately. Fixed bug , metadata$address missing metadata$author used author name. Removes RJournal.sty file conflicts inner workings pandoc. Fixed file extension editing using xfun::with_ext() instead gsub(). precise title description. Added rebib dependency given now available cran(hence closing #38) Fixed bugs related copying files images (Github Issue #36 #34)

title: Version 0.6.9
text: Added algorithm2e graphics support (beta) (GitHub Issue #32) Added tikz graphics support (GitHub Issue #7) Added automation workflow separate logger logging success failure conversion.

title: Version 0.6.9
text: Fixing equation labeling issue , ., _ equations also added eq: equation starts present. Added support relative paths Fixed bugs figure parser new regex. Fixed tikz lib extraction method

title: Version 0.6.9
text: Removing old bibliographic parser/converter texor favour new implementation rebib supports many features.

title: Version 0.6.7
text: Equation labeling numbering Code/table/equation/figure pre-processors fixed many meta data related issues now use Mathjax V3 New testthat test cases pkgdown website texor::latex_to_web() single article new stat tools metrics conversion coverage check environment/word count pandoc convert

title: Version 0.6.7
text: Support absolute paths Fixed lot logic errors Fixed incompatibilities removed unnecessary code features R-CMD-check passing Github workflows work now Improved stat filter exports pre post conversion stats yaml file namespaces logger URL fix non http:// web Links Figure max width : 100% extra option added figures. fixed pre processing tikz fixed problems journal volume comment filter mechanism latex improved lua filter numbering centering figures fixed slug issue

Reading bibliography bibtex files ignoring \thebibliography parser read convert inbuilt \thebibliography bibtex Supports code environments like Sinput,Soutput, example ,example*,verbatim code highlight.
